column2:
ggplot(sm.df %>% filter(Team ==12), aes(x = Date)) +
   geom_rect(aes(xmin = min(sm.df$Date)-2, xmax = max(sm.df$Date)+2, ymin = -Inf, ymax = PWP*100),
             fill = "brown4", alpha = 0.002)+
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = min(sm.df$Date)-2, xmax = max(sm.df$Date)+2, ymin = PWP*100, ymax = FC*100),
            fill = "gold", alpha = 0.002)+
     geom_rect(aes(xmin = min(sm.df$Date)-2, xmax = max(sm.df$Date)+2, ymin = FC*100, ymax = Inf),
             fill = "green4", alpha = 0.002)+
  geom_line(aes(y = daily_avg_moist, color = "Soil Moisture"), size = 1.5) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = PWP*100, linetype = "dashed", color = "brown") +  
  geom_hline(yintercept = FC*100, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +  
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~., name = "Soil Moisture (%)")) +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", values = c("Calculated Soil Moisture" = "darkred", "Soil Probe Reading" = "blue")) +
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Irrigation (mm)", title = "Irrigation and Soil Moisture over Time") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "top")
